clauses.title: Intellectual Property Rights
clauses.summary: All developed software and related IP shall remain property of TechCorp Inc.

clauses.title: Termination Clause
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

insights.title: Payment Terms Ambiguity
insights.description: Payment schedule lacks specific milestones and could lead to disputes.

insights.title: Add Force Majeure Clause
insights.description: Consider adding comprehensive force majeure provisions for better risk management.

evidence.snippet: Payment shall be made within 30 days of invoice receipt

clauses.title: Confidentiality Obligations
clauses.summary: Both parties agree to maintain strict confidentiality of shared information.

insights.title: Standard NDA Template
insights.description: This follows industry standard NDA practices with minimal risk.

evidence.snippet: All confidential information shall be protected for a period of 5 years

clauses.title: Maintenance Responsibilities
clauses.summary: Lessee responsible for routine maintenance, lessor handles major repairs.

clauses.title: Early Termination
clauses.summary: Penalty fees apply for early termination without cause.

insights.title: Contract Expiring Soon
insights.description: This contract expires in less than 3 months. Renewal negotiations should begin.

insights.title: Unclear Maintenance Terms
insights.description: Maintenance responsibility boundaries are not clearly defined.

evidence.snippet: Equipment must be returned in original condition, reasonable wear excepted

clauses.title: Performance Metrics
clauses.summary: Success measured by lead generation targets and conversion rates.

insights.title: Vague Performance Metrics
insights.description: Success criteria are not quantitatively defined, leading to potential disputes.

evidence.snippet: Contractor shall generate qualified leads as mutually agreed

clauses.title: Quality Standards
clauses.summary: All products must meet ISO 9001 quality standards.

clauses.title: Price Adjustment
clauses.summary: Prices subject to quarterly review based on market conditions.

insights.title: Price Volatility Risk
insights.description: Consider price caps or more frequent reviews to manage cost volatility.

evidence.snippet: Delivery schedule shall not exceed 14 business days from order

clauses.title: Rent Escalation
clauses.summary: Annual rent increase of 3% or CPI, whichever is higher.

insights.title: Lease Expiring Soon
insights.description: Commercial lease expires in 4 months. Renewal terms should be negotiated.

evidence.snippet: Tenant responsible for all utilities and common area maintenance

clauses.title: Usage Limitations
clauses.summary: License limited to 100 concurrent users maximum.

insights.title: Standard License Terms
insights.description: License terms are standard and present minimal risk.

evidence.snippet: Software may not be reverse engineered or redistributed

clauses.title: Non-Compete Clause
clauses.summary: Employee cannot work for competitors for 6 months after termination.

insights.title: Non-Compete Enforceability
insights.description: Non-compete clauses have varying enforceability across jurisdictions.

evidence.snippet: Base salary of $85,000 with annual performance review

clauses.title: GDPR Compliance
clauses.summary: Both parties must maintain GDPR compliance for all data processing.

insights.title: Regulatory Compliance Risk
insights.description: GDPR violations can result in significant penalties. Ensure ongoing compliance.

evidence.snippet: Data must be encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256

clauses.title: Deliverables Schedule
clauses.summary: Monthly reports and quarterly strategic assessments required.

insights.title: Contract Renewal Needed
insights.description: Consulting agreement expires in 2 months. Review performance before renewal.

evidence.snippet: Consultant shall provide strategic recommendations based on industry analysis
